      • isAncestor

        public static boolean isAncestor(Path possibleAncestor,
                                 Path fullPath)
        Checks whether possibleAncestor is an ancestor of fullPath.
        Parameters:
        possibleAncestor - Possible ancestor of fullPath.
        fullPath - path to check.
        Returns:
        true if possibleAncestor is an ancestor of fullPath.

      • isGlob

        public static boolean isGlob(Path path)
        Returns:
        true if path has glob tokens (e.g. *, {, \, }, etc.)

      • removeExtension

        public static Path removeExtension(Path path,
                                   String... extensions)
        Removes all extensions from path if they exist. 
         PathUtils.removeExtention("file.txt", ".txt")                      = file
 PathUtils.removeExtention("file.txt.gpg", ".txt", ".gpg")          = file
 PathUtils.removeExtention("file", ".txt")                          = file
 PathUtils.removeExtention("file.txt", ".tar.gz")                   = file.txt
 PathUtils.removeExtention("file.txt.gpg", ".txt")                  = file.gpg
 PathUtils.removeExtention("file.txt.gpg", ".gpg")                  = file.txt
        Parameters:
        path - in which the extensions need to be removed
        extensions - to be removed
        Returns:
        a new Path without extensions

      • addExtension

        public static Path addExtension(Path path,
                                String... extensions)
        Suffix all extensions to path. 
         PathUtils.addExtension("/tmp/data/file", ".txt")                          = file.txt
 PathUtils.addExtension("/tmp/data/file.txt.gpg", ".zip")                  = file.txt.gpg.zip
 PathUtils.addExtension("/tmp/data/file.txt", ".tar", ".gz")               = file.txt.tar.gz
 PathUtils.addExtension("/tmp/data/file.txt.gpg", ".tar.txt")              = file.txt.gpg.tar.txt
        Parameters:
        path - to which the extensions need to be added
        extensions - to be added
        Returns:
        a new Path with extensions

      • combinePaths

        public static Path combinePaths(String... paths)

      • isAbsoluteAndSchemeAuthorityNull

        public static boolean isAbsoluteAndSchemeAuthorityNull(Path path)
        Is an absolute path (ie a slash relative path part) AND a scheme is null AND authority is null.

      • deleteEmptyParentDirectories

        public static void deleteEmptyParentDirectories(FileSystem fs,
                                                Path limitPath,
                                                Path startPath)
                                         throws IOException
        Deletes empty directories starting with startPath and all ancestors up to but not including limitPath.
        Parameters:
        fs - FileSystem where paths are located.
        limitPath - only Paths that are strict descendants of this path will be deleted.
        startPath - first Path to delete. Afterwards empty ancestors will be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException
